sentences.sentence: There was no dark cells in ganglionic layer.
sentences.translation: 神经节细胞层无暗细胞。

sentences.sentence: It suggested that SS was synthesized and stored in rat intrinsic cardiac ganglionic cells.
sentences.translation: 表明大鼠心内神经节细胞有SS合成和贮存。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To evaluate the value of MR Imaging (MRI) in diagnosing brachial plexus pre-ganglionic injury.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨MRI检查在诊断臂丛神经节前损伤中的影像表现和诊断价值。
